main_symptom: Vomiting, gastrointestinal dilation, ultrasound indicating a foreign body in the jejunum, the owner opts for conservative treatment, starting with symptomatic treatment and continuous monitoring of evacuation status. If there is no significant downward evacuation迹象 by tomorrow, surgical intervention is recommended for treatment.
zhu_su: 主诉最近都有呕吐的情况，未见饮食喝水，精神状态有变差
左前脚指甲整体脱落，有出血，目前已止血。

main_symptom:
Giemsababesia

（注：吉氏巴贝斯焦虫在英文中通常被称为“Giemsababesia”，这是一个由“Giemsa”和“Babesia”组合而成的学名，用于指代这种特定的寄生虫。Giemsa是一种染色剂，常用于血液样本的染色，而Babesia是一类寄生虫的属名。）
zhu_su: 有四天不吃东西，精神差，可视黏膜苍白。

main_symptom: Mild anemia; Suspected hypothyroidism; Bladder stone
zhu_su:
病情：公狗没有绝育。屁股后面长了一颗东西有半年，好几年前长过一次，自己消掉了
病史：有跛行（LL）五年前去拍片未见异常。偶尔皮肤病、耳炎

精神：正常
饮食：Go狗粮、鸭肉干
小便：正常
大便：正常，没有排便困难

main_symptom: Pulmonary hemorrhage, elevated liver indices, fracture of the ischial angle, skin laceration, tongue断裂, others pending investigation.
zhu_su:
昨晚8楼掉到二楼，嘴唇，后肢无力爬不起来，有出血，剃毛后发现肛门后外侧皮肤出现破损导致出血，
呼吸急促，

main_symptom: Food-induced gastroenteritis, with中毒 not ruled out
zhu_su: 昨天在家吃了蛋糕，今天有吐又拉的，精神状态一般

main_symptom: Rhinitis fungosa; Otitis caused by cocci, Malassezia; Skin scales,少量 cocci
zhu_su: 鼻子上有脱毛，耳朵上有脱毛。

main_symptom: Viral Disease Screening: Parvovirus + Coronavirus (Negative); X-ray: Gastric dilation, partial dilation of the intestines and rectal end, small amount of fecal accumulation in the rectum,模糊 anal details; Basic Blood Test: Routine blood test (no abnormal indicators temporarily) / Inflammatory marker CRP (moderate inflammation); Fecal Examination: No obvious internal parasites detected, abundant undigested fibers; Preliminary Diagnosis: Gastroenteritis causing indigestion / Perianal developmental abnormality? Excessive diarrhea-induced? (Under observation)
zhu_su:
1.疫苗驱虫全
2.约半个月前出现拉稀，过后康复，近几日又出现异常
便便不成型且腥味重，精神一般，胃口下降，今天呕吐一次
3.肛周湿润，就医时发现肛门结构异常，直肠暴露
4.家中另外有一只狗暂无异常
5.平时吃狗粮，偶尔有吃其他
左前肢狼爪指甲过长扎到肉里，有恶臭味，流脓血

main_symptom: DR: Left sacroiliac joint dislocation; right femoral head dislocation, suspected断裂 of the growth plates of both femoral heads, further CT scan recommended for confirmation. Owner has chosen to observe first and has signed accordingly.
zhu_su:
凌晨12点左右发现猫不见了,早上6点在一楼找到,阳台没完全密封,猜测可能是从3楼掉下去了,精神萎靡,没怎么吃东西,有小便,没大便
疫苗:昨天接种的第一针
final_disease: Avascular Necrosis of the Femoral Head

main_symptom: Pancreatitis; renal failure, hyperphosphatemia, acidemia; owner放弃treatment, euthanasia performed
zhu_su: 昨天开始拉稀,拉了10次左右,今天出现呕吐一次,今天也有拉稀的情况,今天喝水正常,吃得比较少。吃完喝完以后3个小时左右出现呕吐

main_symptom: Ringworm; Antibody test不合格, re-vaccination recommended
zhu_su: 新养幼猫一个月，近两天发现右耳后和左后脚有掉毛。
小便特别多，喝水也特别多。

main_symptom: Overgrown/Curved/Piercing Foot Pads; Bacterial Suppurative Infection
zhu_su: 指甲过长倒生插入肉垫，有脓性渗出，精神食欲及大小二便正常。

main_symptom: Suspected heart disease, pet owner放弃 examination
zhu_su:
后肢瘫痪，早上突然出现的，疑似心脏病
主人放弃检查

main_symptom: Infection with Corynebacterium auris,清洗 and apply medication daily, treatment duration 1-2 weeks, follow-up visit after 1 week. For soft stools, use probiotics at home to regulate and observe; if there is no significant improvement or if the condition worsens, further examination and a change in treatment plan will be necessary.
zhu_su: 买了5.6天了，耳朵经常看着挠，每天软便，精神食欲没问题。
